transcend.4_1:
ATK DEF HP +16%
At the start of battle, grants Irregular Infection for 1 turn to the enemy with the highest Speed. (Ignores Immunity, Irremovable)
Increases Effectiveness by 40
transcend.5_1:
ATK DEF HP +22%
Grants Action Point by 50 on entry
Increases Ally Resilience by 6%
transcend.6:
ATK DEF HP +30%
When Irregular Infection effect triggers, buff / debuff durations are reduced by 2 turns
Increases allies' damage against the target inflicted with Irregular Infection by 50%

SKT_FIRST.name: Feeding Frenzy
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy and increases own Priority by <color=#28d9ed>10%</color>. With a <color=#28d9ed>30%</color> chance, reduces the target’s <color=#28d9ed>Speed</color> for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.\nThis skill’s damage dealt increases proportional to Max Health instead of Attack.

SKT_BURST_2.effect: Grants Irregular Infection to the enemy with the highest Speed for 1 turn (Ignores Immunity, Irremovable)

SKT_BURST_3.effect: <color=#FFBF00>Enhanced Attack</color>\nIncreases Skill Range (All)\nGrants Barrier to all allies for 2 turns (Proportional to caster's Health)

description: Attacks an enemy and increases own Priority by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000102_1_1]</color>. With a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000102_1_2]</color> chance, reduces the targetâs <color=#28d9ed>Speed</color> for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000102_1_2] turn(s)</color>.\nThis skillâs damage dealt increases proportional to Max Health instead of Attack.

SKT_SECOND.name: Species Extinction Protocol
SKT_SECOND.true_desc:
(Passive Effect)
Reduces Damage Taken by heroes with Barriers.
<color=#28d9ed>Reduces Damage Dealt by those inflicted with Irregular Infection</color>, and has an <color=#28d9ed>80%</color> chance to counterattack when hit.

(Triggered Effect)
On your turn, attacking a target with <color=#28d9ed>Irregular Infection</color> triggers an additional attack on all enemies. After the additional attack, reduces Priority of the infected target by <color=#28d9ed>50%</color>.
This skill’s damage dealt increases proportional to Max Health instead of Attack.

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: End of Protoform
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc:
Attacks all enemies. With a <color=#28d9ed>100%</color> chance, grants <color=#28d9ed>Taunted</color> to the target for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>, and when attacking a boss, deals Fixed Damage equal to <color=#28d9ed>8%</color> of the boss’ Max Health.

Then grants a <color=#28d9ed>Barrier</color> to all heroes for <color=#28d9ed>1 turns</color> and grants <color=#28d9ed>Irregular Infection</color> to the fastest enemy for <color=#28d9ed>1 turns</color>. (Ignores Immunity, Irremovable)
This skill’s damage dealt increases proportional to Max Health instead of Attack.
description:

Then grants a <color=#28d9ed>Barrier</color> to all heroes for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000102_3_2] turns</color> and grants <color=#28d9ed>Irregular Infection</color> to the fastest enemy for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000102_3_3] turns</color>. (Ignores Immunity, Irremovable)
This skillâs damage dealt increases proportional to Max Health instead of Attack.

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Companion Effect</color>: Increases caster’s Skill Chain Attack proportional to caster’s Max Health rather Attack and restores Action Point the caster and the next chain skill caster by <color=#28d9ed>25</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: Increases caster’s Skill Chain Attack proportional to caster’s Max Health rather Attack and after the attack, has a 50% chance to reduce the target’s Speed for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.
